name: Titanium.UI.iOS.ViewAttachmentBehavior
summary: Dynamic behavior to support connections between two items.

properties.name: anchorItem
properties.summary: Item to use as the anchor in this behavior.

properties.name: anchorOffset
properties.summary: Offset from the center point of the anchor item for the attachment.

properties.name: damping
properties.summary: Amount of damping to apply to the attachment behavior.

properties.name: distance
properties.summary: Distance, in points, between the two attachment points.

properties.name: item
properties.summary: Item to connect to use the attachment behavior.

properties.name: itemOffset
properties.summary: Offset from the center point of the item for the attachment.
